alcohol.Name: gin1
alcohol.Description: A sophisticated, sparkling cocktail with a refreshing citrus twist.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 oz gin
1/2 oz fresh lemon juice
1/2 oz simple syrup
3 oz Champagne or sparkling wine
Lemon twist (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a cocktail shaker, combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into a chilled 
3. Champagne flute.
Top with Champagne and garnish with a lemon twist.

alcohol.Name: gin2
alcohol.Description: A vibrant, fruity cocktail with a delightful balance of floral and berry notes.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz gin
1/2 oz elderflower liqueur
1 oz fresh grapefruit juice
1/4 oz simple syrup
Splash of cranberry juice
Grapefruit slice (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a shaker, add gin, elderflower liqueur, grapefruit juice, simple syrup, and ice.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
3. Add a splash of cranberry juice for color and garnish with a grapefruit slice.

alcohol.Name: gin3
alcohol.Description: A classic and refreshing cocktail with a perfect blend of gin and tonic water.
alcohol.Ingredients:
2 oz gin
4 oz tonic water
Lime wedge (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Fill a glass with ice cubes, pour in gin, and top with tonic water.
2. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

alcohol.Name: gin4
alcohol.Description: A zesty and refreshing gin cocktail with a bold citrus flavor.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz gin
1 oz fresh lemon juice
1/2 oz simple syrup
Lemon wheel (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a shaker, add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.
3. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

alcohol.Name: gin5
alcohol.Description: A classic gin martini with a hint of herbal complexity.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz gin
1/2 oz dry vermouth
1/4 oz absinthe or pastis (optional)
2 dashes orange bitters
Lemon twist or olive (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Stir gin, dry vermouth, absinthe (if using), and bitters with ice in a mixing glass.
2. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
3. Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.

alcohol.Name: gin6
alcohol.Description: A refreshing cocktail with berry flavors and a hint of citrus.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz gin
1/2 oz crème de mûre (blackberry liqueur)
1/2 oz fresh lemon juice
1/4 oz simple syrup
Fresh blackberries (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a shaker, combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice.
2. Shake and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.
3. Drizzle crème de mûre over the top and garnish with blackberries.

alcohol.Name: gin7
alcohol.Description: A classic gin martini that’s dry and sophisticated.
alcohol.Ingredients:
2 oz gin
1/2 oz dry vermouth
Lemon twist or olive (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Stir gin and dry vermouth with ice in a mixing glass.
2. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
3. Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.

alcohol.Name: gin8
alcohol.Description: A creamy, citrusy gin cocktail with a silky texture and a touch of sweetness.
alcohol.Ingredients:
2 oz gin
1/2 oz fresh lemon juice
1/2 oz fresh lime juice
1 oz simple syrup
1 oz heavy cream
1 egg white
2-3 drops orange flower water
Club soda (to top)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a shaker, combine gin, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, cream, egg white, and orange flower water.
2. Shake vigorously without ice for 15-20 seconds, then add ice and shake again.
3. Strain into a chilled highball glass and top with club soda for a frothy finish.

alcohol.Name: rum1
alcohol.Description: A tropical, sparkling cocktail with a sweet and fruity blend of pineapple and rum.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz gold rum
1/2 oz Galliano liqueur
2 oz fresh pineapple juice
Dash of lime juice
Prosecco or Champagne (to top)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake rum, Galliano, pineapple juice, and lime juice with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and top with Prosecco.

alcohol.Name: rum2
alcohol.Description: A rich and creamy cocktail with a chocolatey twist, perfect for dessert lovers.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz dark rum
1 oz crème de cacao
1 oz cream or half-and-half
Chocolate shavings (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake rum, crème de cacao, and cream with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with chocolate shavings.

alcohol.Name: rum3
alcohol.Description: A vibrant, tropical punch with a mix of rum, fruit, and spices.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 oz dark rum
1 oz light rum
1 oz pineapple juice
1 oz orange juice
Dash of grenadine
Dash of bitters
Orange slice and cherry (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Combine both rums, juices, grenadine, and bitters with ice in a shaker.
2. Shake well and strain into an ice-filled glass.
Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

alcohol.Name: rum4
alcohol.Description: A bold, smoky cocktail with a hint of spice, perfect for adventurous palates.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz mezcal
1/2 oz triple sec
1 oz fresh lime juice
1/2 oz simple syrup
Chili pepper (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake mezcal, triple sec, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a chili pepper.

alcohol.Name: rum5
alcohol.Description: A tropical cocktail that combines rum with the exotic flavors of passionfruit and coconut.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz white rum
1 oz passionfruit juice
1 oz coconut cream
1/2 oz lime juice
Passionfruit slice (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake rum, passionfruit juice, coconut cream, and lime juice with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a passionfruit slice.

alcohol.Name: rum6
alcohol.Description: A classic tropical cocktail bursting with a blend of fruit juices and rum.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 oz light rum
1 oz dark rum
2 oz orange juice
2 oz pineapple juice
1/4 oz grenadine
Orange slice and cherry (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake both rums, juices, and grenadine with ice.
2. Strain into an ice-filled glass and garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

alcohol.Name: rum7
alcohol.Description: A zesty, citrus-forward cocktail with a hint of herbal complexity.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz rum
1/2 oz Aperol
1 oz fresh grapefruit juice
1/4 oz simple syrup
Grapefruit twist (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake rum, Aperol, grapefruit juice, and simple syrup with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a grapefruit twist.

alcohol.Name: rum8
alcohol.Description: A strong, multi-layered tiki cocktail that combines various rums with tropical juices and spices.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 oz white rum
1 oz dark rum
1 oz overproof rum
1 oz pineapple juice
1 oz lime juice
1/2 oz grenadine
1/4 oz falernum or allspice dram
Mint sprig (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake all ingredients (except overproof rum) with ice.
2. Strain into a large glass filled with ice, and float the overproof rum on top.
3. Garnish with a mint sprig.

alcohol.Name: tequila1
alcohol.Description: A fruity twist on the classic margarita, with sweet strawberries and a hint of lime.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz tequila
1 oz triple sec
1 oz fresh lime juice
1/2 cup fresh strawberries, hulled
Ice
Salt or sugar for rimming (optional)
Strawberry slice (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a blender, combine tequila, triple sec, lime juice, strawberries, and ice. Blend until smooth.
2. Rim the glass with salt or sugar if desired, then pour in the cocktail.
3. Garnish with a strawberry slice.

alcohol.Name: tequila2
alcohol.Description: A classic, layered cocktail with a vibrant mix of tequila, orange, and grenadine.
alcohol.Ingredients:
2 oz tequila
4 oz orange juice
1/2 oz grenadine
Orange slice and cherry (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Fill a glass with ice, pour in tequila and orange juice, and stir gently.
2. Slowly pour grenadine over the back of a spoon to create a gradient.
3. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

alcohol.Name: tequila3
alcohol.Description: A refreshing, citrusy cocktail with tequila and grapefruit, perfect for hot days.
alcohol.Ingredients:
2 oz tequila
1/2 oz fresh lime juice
4 oz grapefruit soda (or fresh grapefruit juice and club soda)
Salt (optional, for rimming)
Lime wedge (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Rim the glass with salt if desired and add ice.
2. Pour in tequila, lime juice, and top with grapefruit soda.
3. Garnish with a lime wedge.

alcohol.Name: tequila4
alcohol.Description: A seasonal margarita with a hint of cinnamon and winter citrus flavors.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz tequila
1 oz orange liqueur
1 oz fresh lime juice
1 oz fresh orange juice
Dash of cinnamon
Cinnamon stick or orange slice (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a shaker, combine tequila, orange liqueur, lime juice, orange juice, and a dash of cinnamon with ice.
2. Shake and strain into a glass filled with ice.
3. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or orange slice.

alcohol.Name: tequila5
alcohol.Description: A creamy cocktail with flavors of coffee, chocolate, and a hint of spice.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 oz tequila
1 oz coffee liqueur
1 oz chocolate liqueur
1 oz heavy cream
Ground cinnamon (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake tequila, coffee liqueur, chocolate liqueur, and cream with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and sprinkle with ground cinnamon.

alcohol.Name: tequila6
alcohol.Description: A warm, spiced cocktail that blends tequila with apple cider for a cozy feel.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz tequila
4 oz warm apple cider
1/4 oz maple syrup
Dash of cinnamon and nutmeg
Apple slice (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a heat-proof glass, combine tequila, warm apple cider, maple syrup, and spices.
2. Stir gently and garnish with an apple slice.

alcohol.Name: tequila7
alcohol.Description: A tropical-inspired tequila cocktail with flavors of pineapple, coconut, and a hint of lime.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz tequila
1 oz coconut cream
2 oz pineapple juice
1/2 oz fresh lime juice
Pineapple slice or mint sprig (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake tequila, coconut cream, pineapple juice, and lime juice with ice.
2. Strain into an ice-filled glass and garnish with a pineapple slice or mint sprig.

alcohol.Name: brandy1
alcohol.Description: A smooth, slightly tart brandy cocktail with a hint of lemon and cherry.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz brandy
1/2 oz triple sec
1/2 oz fresh lemon juice
Cherry (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake brandy, triple sec, and lemon juice with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a cherry.

alcohol.Name: brandy2
alcohol.Description: A rich, dessert-style cocktail combining brandy and amaretto with a creamy finish.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 oz brandy
1 oz amaretto
1 oz heavy cream
Chocolate shavings (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake brandy, amaretto, and cream with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with chocolate shavings.

alcohol.Name: brandy3
alcohol.Description: A balanced, tangy cocktail with brandy and fresh lemon for a refreshing sour taste.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz brandy
1 oz fresh lemon juice
1/2 oz simple syrup
Lemon twist (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake brandy, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice.
2. Strain into an ice-filled glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

alcohol.Name: brandy4
alcohol.Description: A smooth, slightly sweet brandy cocktail with rich port wine undertones.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 oz brandy
1 oz port wine
1/2 oz simple syrup
Dash of bitters
Orange twist (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Stir brandy, port wine, simple syrup, and bitters with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with an orange twist.

alcohol.Name: brandy5
alcohol.Description: A refreshing cocktail with a pink hue, blending brandy with tart lemonade flavors.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz brandy
1 oz cranberry juice
1/2 oz fresh lemon juice
1/2 oz simple syrup
Lemon wedge (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Shake brandy, cranberry juice, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

alcohol.Name: brandy6
alcohol.Description: A fruity, refreshing drink featuring brandy, berries, and citrus.
alcohol.Ingredients:
2 oz brandy
1/2 oz simple syrup
Fresh berries (such as raspberries, blackberries, and strawberries)
Orange slice (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. In a glass, muddle the berries with simple syrup.
2. Add brandy and fill with crushed ice. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

alcohol.Name: brandy7
alcohol.Description: A rich, herbal brandy cocktail with vermouth and bitters, offering a sophisticated taste.
alcohol.Ingredients:
1 1/2 oz brandy
1 oz sweet vermouth
Dash of orange bitters
Orange twist (for garnish)
alcohol.Recipe:
1. Stir brandy, sweet vermouth, and bitters with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with an orange twist.
